title: Should I let the cat drink from my water?
body:
So I [tweeted](https://twitter.com/kee_in/status/1364787683587842049):
>i've been drinking out the same glass as the cat for years and nothing bad has ever happened to me

My friend Travis (travisformayor.eth) said I should put this to a poll, see what the holders think.

_Should I allow the cat to drink from my water cup?_

Note that this will also affect whether I allow the cat to lick the top of beer cans, which she likes to do. my cat likes beer.

(previous cat poll: [Can the cat go on the counter?](https://vote.kiancoin.com/#/kian.eth/proposal/Qmc4oBbRmVgPRfWvJxcMx3cdVwK2kEMhVj5mwRt1ca222F))
author: 0x5295b474F3A0bB39418456c96D6FCf13901A4aA1
